name: patch-roulette-web-extension
description: Streamlines opening diffs in the Patch Roulette Diff Viewer.

scripts.build:chrome: bun run build:vite && bun run build:manifest-chrome
scripts.build:firefox: bun run build:vite && bun run build:manifest-firefox
scripts.pack:chrome: bun run build:chrome && mkdir -p pack && rm -f pack/chrome.zip && (cd dist && zip -r ../pack/chrome.zip .)
scripts.pack:firefox: bun run build:firefox && mkdir -p pack && rm -f pack/firefox.zip && (cd dist && zip -r ../pack/firefox.zip .)
scripts.pack: bun run pack:chrome && bun run pack:firefox
